snippet: A slide show of photographs of the past week in New York City and the region includes Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey, the 193rd Greek Independence Day Parade and Mayor Bill de Blasio at the Mets’ opening day.
abstract: A slide show of photographs of the past week in New York City and the region includes Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey, the 193rd Greek Independence Day Parade and Mayor Bill de Blasio at the Mets’ opening day.
